segments.text: I find myself looking out the window a lot in this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden visible through the panes is so incredibly peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s a tidy path, with low bushes flanking it perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a stark contrast to the unfolding chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight emphasizes the orderliness of the world beyond the glass.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost as if two different realities are coexisting side-by-side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of calm just imagining being out there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If only the inside could match that quiet tranquility.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sounds of nature must be so much more pleasant than a gushing faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame that such beauty is being overshadowed by domestic mishaps.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would just turn around and see the outside world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Perhaps the children would notice the calm too, if they weren't so focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window acts as a frame for both serenity and pending pandemonium.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm happy for the beauty of the garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a nice little escape from the indoor drama.
segments.speaker: PAR
